thread.subject: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear Sapphire Bay Resort Team,

We are writing to inquire about potential collaboration opportunities for our New Year Rewards Program. We are interested in partnering with your esteemed establishment to offer exclusive discounts and amenities to our members during the period of January 10th to January 15th, 2024.  We are particularly interested in your Deluxe Ocean View rooms and access to the Coral Conference Hall for a potential small event. Could you please provide us with information on your pricing and availability for this period?

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,
John Smith
Marketing Manager
Your Company

thread.subject: Re: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear John Smith,

Thank you for your interest in partnering with Sapphire Bay Resort for your New Year Rewards Program. We appreciate your inquiry.

Unfortunately, we are currently undergoing renovations in the main building from January 10th to January 15th, 2024, impacting the availability of the Coral Conference Hall and some of our Deluxe Ocean View rooms. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

We would be happy to discuss alternative dates or perhaps offer you the same benefits at our sister property, the Emerald Coast Inn, which is just a short drive away and offers similar amenities.  They have availability throughout January.

Please let us know if you would like to discuss these options further.

Sincerely,
Maria Hernandez
Sales Manager
Sapphire Bay Resort

thread.subject: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear Maria Hernandez,

Thank you for your prompt response and we apologize for the oversight regarding the renovations.  We appreciate the offer of alternative dates and the suggestion of the Emerald Coast Inn.

Could you please provide us with information regarding pricing and availability at the Emerald Coast Inn for the same period (Jan 10th-15th)?  We are particularly interested in their equivalent of the Deluxe Ocean View rooms and any available conference facilities.

Thanks again for your assistance.

Sincerely,
John Smith
Marketing Manager
Your Company

thread.subject: Re: Re: Re: New Year Rewards Program Inquiry
thread.body:
Dear John Smith and Jane Doe,

I've cc'd Peter Jones, our Emerald Coast Inn liaison, who can provide you with the specific details you requested. He will be in touch shortly with pricing and availability.

Sincerely,
Maria Hernandez
Sales Manager
Sapphire Bay Resort
